Project.Brief history of your project and organi: UCAR is a hub for the Earth system sciences and a gateway to cutting-edge resources and services. Our team help save this dataset and choose filecoin as a safe way.
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File: ARISE-SAI-1.5 simulations include extensive output for the atmospheric, land, ocean and sea-ice model components. All model output for the simulations is in NetCDF format. All variables are in time-series format, with one variable per file. 3-dimensional atmospheric output is on the original 70 model levels. Output consists of standard monthly mean CMIP6 output for the atmospheric, land, ocean, and sea-ice models. In addition, higher-frequency (daily averaged, 3-hourly averaged, 3-hourly instantaneous, and 1-hourly mean) output is available for the atmospheric model. A listing of all output variables is available (output follows member 006 - 010 of the reference simulations described below).
Project.How do you plan to prepare the dataset: We've downloaded this dataset into our storage servers. Then we would provide download links to sps.
Project.In which geographies do you plan on maki: Greater China, Asia other than Greater China, Africa, North America, South America, Europe, Australia (continent)
Project.How will you be distributing your data t: Cloud storage (i.e. S3), HTTP or FTP server
